text: So I noticed an issue with the DM preview (when choosing to preview without preview options). When you choose to do this, any settings in the Settings > Website > Pages > Templates tab that you set (such as attached styles and header code) are not added into the preview that displays on <http://preview.hs-sites.com|preview.hs-sites.com> which forces you to use the preview with options. Is there a way to do something like
Looks like its just adding a param to the normal preview url of `domain=<http://12345.hs-sites.com|12345.hs-sites.com>`
